metadata.dc:description: In our communication we wish consider to bring at a first instance the egregious figure of Robert Koch a hundred of years after his dead. Nobody else had contributed so much in the development of the bacteriology as unic and independent science. Several books and biographical sketchs had been published about Koch in german, english and french, mainly, with differents detais and interpretations, about his life. However, nobody doubred about his innovator spirit and scientist at highest level. This communication revise and discuss diverse chapters about his life as innovator, researcher, groups leader and Magister.
metadata.dc:title: Robert Koch, eminente bacteriólogo médico gran impulsor de la microbiología aplicada y su técnica.
[Robert Koch, eminent medical bacteriologist, creator of the applied microbiology and its technnology].
